item.description: Workshop On-site SEO for Developers - Notes Parts of SEO described in this workshop: Technical SEO On-page SEO How Google Works Website Architecture important resource should be available after no more than 5 clicks Googlebot: Home page /blog /article Tips to avoid problem with having more than 5 clicks increase page size of pagination show 20-30 posts on one page SSR Server-side rendering is still needed You need one of these techniques: pre-rendering dynamic rendering server-side rendering Canonical URLs Canonical urls should be on your website Need to add canonical url to post’s page and all pages like /blog <link rel="canonical" href="https://maxoid.
